name: Dungeon Wizard (robbossmango89, RedX16)
description:
Somehow you find yourself in a dungeon. Can you find your way out? You wake up surrounded by knights who will give you advice. You also see some monsters they are harmless you are told but you can practice your moves on them as they are tough.

How to paly: Move player with WASD, to attack use LEFT MOUSE, to use fire ball, use RIGHT MOUSE.

ESC key to pause game, click chest in top left to open weapon upgrade menu.

Contributors:

redx16 - Programmer/Particles/ Level Design

robbossmango89 - Programmer/ Level Design
